title: IU ACCE dept chair takes charge
body: Professor Mamun Al Rashid of Applied Chemistry and Chemical Engineering department of Islamic University in Kushtia took charge as new chairman of the department on Saturday. A programme was held on the occasion at the seminar room of ACCE department at Applied Science and Engineering Academic building, said a press release. IU vice-chancellor Professor Nakib Muhammad Nasrullah was present as chief guest at the event where treasurer Professor Jahangir Alam and acting registrar Professor Manjurul Haque were special guests. Besides, IIER director Professor Mostafhizour Rahman, provost council president and Begum Khaleda Zia Hall provost Professor Jalal Uddin and other teachers of the department were present there. Earlier, on December 9, an office order signed by acting registrar Professor Manjurul Haque confirmed the appointment of Professor Mamun Al Rashid as new chairman replacing Professor Sharif Md Al-Reza of the same department.
